labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to interface with the YouTube Translate API, providing tools to extract, translate, and analyze video content. Its core functionality revolves around processing video transcripts, generating translations, subtitles, summaries, and enabling keyword searches within video content. This makes it highly specialized for multimedia content analysis and natural language processing tasks related to video platforms.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Content Creation" was chosen because the server enables creation and transformation of content (transcripts, translations, subtitles). "Data Analysis & Processing" is a secondary label as it involves searching and summarizing video content. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Youtube Translate
server_info_crawled.author: @brianshin22/youtube-translate-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: An MCP server for interfacing with the Youtube Translate API. Create transcripts, translations, subtitles, summaries for any Youtube video (or any other platform). Search video transcripts for keywords and phrases. Directly processes videos to understand them.

tools.name: get_transcript
tools.description: Deploy Server Youtube Translate @brianshin22/youtube-translate-mcp Try in Playground get_transcript

tools.name: get_translation
tools.description: Get a translated transcript of a YouTube video

tools.name: get_subtitles
tools.description: Generate subtitle files for a YouTube video

tools.name: get_summary
tools.description: Generate a summary of a YouTube video

tools.name: search_video
tools.description: Search for specific content within a YouTube video's transcript

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@brianshin22/youtube-translate-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: YOUTUBE_TRANSLATE_API_KEY
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: YouTube Translate API key for accessing the service
